| HistoryText             = [[Chthon (Earth-616)|Chthon]] influenced [[Varuna (Earth-616)|Varuna]] and many others of the [[Bird-Men of Akah Ma'at]], persuading them to become the Asura. The Bird Men that did not follow Varuna became the [[Seraphim (Akah Ma'at) (Earth-616)|Seraphim]].{{r|Marvel Tarot #1}}

The Asura saw themselves as judge, jury and executioner of man and other "lower races."{{r|Marvel Tarot #1}}

A war would unfold between the Asura and the Seraphim, led by [[Shamhat Saraswati (Earth-616)|Shamhat Saraswati]], forcing the Bird Men's creator, [[Oshtur (Earth-616)|Oshtur]], to banish them to another dimension.{{r|Marvel Tarot #1}}{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 7}}
